title: Chinese five spice chicken wings
ingredients: ['4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '3 spring onions, chopped', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 tablespoon Chinese five spice powder', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons sweet chilli sauce', 'salt to taste', '16 chicken wings', '2 limes, quartered']
